Posts.Content:
Jerry, I have to agree with you that the BC forum here is almost stagnant. I wish I could send you to one that is more informative, but I'm still looking as well.
My husband had prostate cancer and I learned so much from that forum that helped both of us.
Age: 71
Posts.Title: New to BC --- a few questions

Posts.Content:
I'm Afterglo from Ontario, Canada. One day after my 70th birthday, I received the news that I have breast cancer in my right breast. I had all four of the core biopsies test malignant. 
The size of the tumour was 2.5 cm and had a lumpectomy in July, 2012.
Pathology report noted Stage 3 with triple negative receptors.
I had the first visit to my oncologist on August 30. He advised 4 chemo treatments one week apart and then 15 radiation sessions.
I have multiple other illnesses as well: Fibromyalgia, Chronic Fatigue Syndrome, Spinal Stenosis, Ataxia, Peripheral Neuropathy...
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
